pr_title: ENGESC-2450 Cannot upload freeipa backup with AES256 encryption

timeline.message: ENGESC-2450 Cannot upload freeipa backup with AES256 encryption

timeline.bodyText: If no default encryption is set it will upload it without any encryption.
